head.supplied: Melbourne botanic Garden ¶ 26/3/63 ¶ Dear Sir ¶ ¶ I herewith return the papers as desired. ¶ I hope to be able to supply the accumulate number of pines, altho' the special sorts are not all in the q...

div.p: H63/2965, unit 58, VPRS 44/P inward registered and unregistered correspondence, VA 538 Department of Crown Lands and Survey, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I herewith return the papers as desired.
See C. Hodgkinson to M, 26 March 1863. I hope to be able to supply the accumulate number of pines, altho' the special sorts are not all in the quantity, mentioned by you, available. But in substituting one kind for the other you will do just as well. Whatever we can muster will be cheerfully placed at your disposal, as I feel sure you will not allow the real rare and valuable plants to perish.
